Title: Rhythm refinement pass
Description: After all writing issues are DONE, run latex-rhythm-refiner section-by-section to improve readability while preserving all citations and meaning
Acceptance: All sections refined; no citation keys changed/dropped; compile still passes; any stylistic changes logged in Notes
Notes: Rhythm refinement pass applied (citations preserved; fillers trimmed; acronyms defined).

Title: Citation verification gate
Description: Every citation in ref.bib is verified against an online source and supports its local claim
Acceptance: No fabricated citations; all BibTeX entries verified; evidence alignment checked per section
Notes: Compile clean: no undefined citations; ref.bib entries are verified (arXiv registry / official docs).

Title: Style QA gate
Description: Run writing-style.md checks per section before marking W issues DONE
Acceptance: Hard gates pass for every section; deviations recorded in issue Notes
Notes: Style QA: no 3 consecutive uncited sentences (heuristic); avoid year-heavy narration; acronyms defined.

Title: Figure and table QA
Description: All figures and tables referenced and explained; sizing fits IEEE two-column layout
Acceptance: No missing refs; no unreadable labels; no Overfull hbox from figures or tables
Notes: All figures/tables referenced; no overfull hbox; floats flushed before references.

Title: Compilation QA
Description: Paper compiles cleanly with bibtex and no undefined citations
Acceptance: compile_paper.py exit 0; no Citation undefined; no Overfull hbox
Notes: compile_paper.py exit 0; main.pdf produced; no undefined citations or overfull hbox warnings.

Title: Page count QA
Description: Main text is about 9 pages and references excluded from count
Acceptance: compile_paper.py --report-page-counts reports main text about 9 pages
Notes: Page count met: main text pages (exclude ref-start page) = 9; references start page = 10.

Title: Final quality checklist
Description: Run references/quality-report.md and address any red flags
Acceptance: Quality checklist passes; remaining caveats documented
Notes: Quality checklist pass: outline aligned; evidence-bounded claims; visuals referenced; delivery criteria met.
